 2002:     Host = ok(inet:gethostname()),
 2003:     case inet:getaddr(Host, inet6) of
 2004: 	{ok, {16#fe80,0,0,0,_,_,_,_} = Addr} ->
 2005: 	     ?SKIPT("Got link local IPv6 address: "
 2006:                     ++inet:ntoa(Addr));
 2007: 	{ok, Addr} ->
 2008: 	    implicit_inet6(Config, Host, Addr);
 2009: 	{error, Reason} ->
 2010: 	    ?SKIPT("Can not look up IPv6 address: "
 2011:                    ++atom_to_list(Reason))
 2012:     end.
 2013: 
 2014: implicit_inet6(Config, Host, Addr) ->
 2015:     Active   = {active,false},
 2016:     Loopback = {0,0,0,0,0,0,0,1},
 2017:     ?P("try 1 with explicit inet6 on loopback"),
 2018:     S1 = case ?OPEN(Config, 0, [inet6, Active, {ip, Loopback}]) of
 2019:              {ok, Sock1} ->
 2020:                  Sock1;
 2021:              {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason1} ->
 2022:                  ?SKIPT(open_failed_str(Reason1));
 2023:              _ ->
 2024:                  ?SKIPT("IPv6 not supported")
 2025:          end,
 2026:     implicit_inet6(Config, S1, Active, Loopback),
 2027:     ok = gen_udp:close(S1),
 2028: 
 2029:     %%
 2030:     Localaddr = ok(get_localaddr()),
 2031:     ?P("try 2 on local addr (~p)", [Localaddr]),
 2032:     S2 = case ?OPEN(Config, 0, [{ip, Localaddr}, Active]) of
 2033:              {ok, Sock2} ->
 2034:                  Sock2;
 2035:              {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason2} ->
 2036:                  ?SKIPT(open_failed_str(Reason2))
 2037:          end,
 2038:     implicit_inet6(Config, S2, Active, Localaddr),
 2039:     ok = gen_udp:close(S2),
 2040: 
 2041:     %%
 2042:     ?P("try 3 on addr ~p (~p)", [Addr, Host]),
 2043:     S3 = case ?OPEN(Config, 0, [{ifaddr, Addr}, Active]) of
 2044:              {ok, Sock3} ->
 2045:                  Sock3;
 2046:              {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason3} ->
 2047:                  ?SKIPT(open_failed_str(Reason3))
 2048:          end,
 2049:     implicit_inet6(Config, S3, Active, Addr),
 2050:     ok = gen_udp:close(S3),
 2051:     ok.
 2052: 
 2053: implicit_inet6(Config, S1, Active, Addr) ->
 2054:     ?P("get (\"local\") port number"),
 2055:     P1 = ok(inet:port(S1)),
 2056:     ?P("open \"remote\" socket"),
 2057:     S2 = case ?OPEN(Config, 0, [inet6, Active]) of
 2058:              {ok, Sock2} ->
 2059:                  Sock2;
 2060:              {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason3} ->
 2061:                  ?SKIPT(open_failed_str(Reason3))
 2062:          end,
 2063:     ?P("get (\"remote\") port number"),
 2064:     P2 = ok(inet:port(S2)),
 2065:     ?P("connect (\"remote\") socket (to ~p:~p)", [Addr, P1]),
 2066:     ok = gen_udp:connect(S2, Addr, P1),
 2067:     ?P("connect (\"local\") socket (to ~p:~p)", [Addr, P2]),
 2068:     ok = gen_udp:connect(S1, Addr, P2),
 2069:     ?P("peername of \"local\" socket"),
 2070:     {Addr,P2} = ok(inet:peername(S1)),
 2071:     ?P("peername of \"remote\" socket"),
 2072:     {Addr,P1} = ok(inet:peername(S2)),
 2073:     ?P("sockname of \"local\" socket"),
 2074:     {Addr,P1} = ok(inet:sockname(S1)),
 2075:     ?P("sockname of \"remote\" socket"),
 2076:     {Addr,P2} = ok(inet:sockname(S2)),
 2077:     ?P("send ping on \"local\" socket (to ~p:~p)", [Addr, P2]),
 2078:     %% On some platforms its allowed to specify address and port
 2079:     %% (that is; when useing sendto) *even* if the socket is connected
 2080:     %% (assuming the send destination is the same as connected destination).
 2081:     %% But on other platforms, e.g. FreeBSD, this is *not* allowed!
 2082:     %% Linux:
 2083:     %%   EISCONN
 2084:     %%      The connection-mode socket was connected already but a recipient
 2085:     %%      was specified. (Now either this error is returned, or the re-
 2086:     %%      cipient specification is ignored.)
 2087:     %% FreeBSD:
 2088:     %%   [EISCONN]    A destination address was specified and the socket is
 2089:     %%                already connected.
 2090:     case gen_udp:send(S1, Addr, P2, "ping") of
 2091:         ok ->
 2092:             ?P("recv ping on \"remote\" socket (from ~p:~p)", [Addr, P1]),
 2093:             {Addr,P1,"ping"} = ok(gen_udp:recv(S2, 1024, 1000)),
 2094:             ?P("send pong on \"remote\" socket (to ~p:~p)", [Addr, P1]),
 2095:             ok = gen_udp:send(S2, Addr, P1, "pong"),
 2096:             ?P("recv ping on \"local\" socket (from ~p:~p)", [Addr, P2]),
 2097:             {Addr,P2,"pong"} = ok(gen_udp:recv(S1, 1024)),
 2098:             ?P("close \"remote\" socket"),
 2099:             ok = gen_udp:close(S2),
 2100:             ok;
 2101:         {error, eisconn} ->
 2102:             ?P("socket is connect => *not* allowed to use sendto"),
 2103:             ok = gen_udp:send(S1, "ping"),
 2104:             %% Not allowed to specify address *at all* for a connected socket
 2105:             ?P("recv ping on \"remote\" socket (from ~p:~p)", [Addr, P1]),
 2106:             {Addr,P1,"ping"} = ok(gen_udp:recv(S2, 1024, 1000)),
 2107:             ?P("send pong on \"remote\" socket (to ~p:~p)", [Addr, P1]),
 2108:             ok = gen_udp:send(S2, "pong"),
 2109:             ?P("recv ping on \"local\" socket (from ~p:~p)", [Addr, P2]),
 2110:             {Addr,P2,"pong"} = ok(gen_udp:recv(S1, 1024)),
 2111:             ?P("close \"remote\" socket"),
 2112:             ok = gen_udp:close(S2),
 2113:             ok
 2114:     end.
 2115: 
 2116: 
 2117: 
 2118: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 2119: 
 2120: %% This is the most basic of tests.
 2121: %% We create a socket, then spawns processes that create
 2122: %% monitors to it...
 2123: socket_monitor1(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2124:     ct:timetrap(?MINS(1)),
 2125:     ?TC_TRY(socket_monitor1,
 2126:             fun() -> do_socket_monitor1(Config) end).
 2127: 
 2128: do_socket_monitor1(Config) ->
 2129:     ?P("begin"),
 2130:     Self         = self(),
 2131:     Type         = ?SOCKET_TYPE(Config),
 2132:     {ok, Sock1} = ?OPEN(Config),
 2133:     F  = fun(S, Fun) -> spawn_monitor(fun() -> Fun(S, Self) end) end,
 2134:     F1 = fun(Socket, Parent) when is_pid(Parent) ->
 2135: 		 ?P("[client] create monitor"),
 2136: 		 MRef = inet:monitor(Socket),
 2137: 		 Parent ! {self(), ready},
 2138: 		 sm_await_socket_down(MRef, Socket, Type)
 2139: 	 end,
 2140:     ?P("spawn client"),
 2141:     {Pid1, Mon1} = F(Sock1, F1),
 2142:     ?P("await client ready"),
 2143:     sm_await_client_ready(Pid1),
 2144:     ?P("close socket"),
 2145:     gen_udp:close(Sock1),
 2146:     ?P("await client termination"),
 2147:     sm_await_down(Pid1, Mon1, ok),
 2148:     ?P("done"),
 2149:     ok.
 2150: 
 2151: sm_await_socket_down(ExpMon, ExpSock, ExpType) ->
 2152:     sm_await_socket_down(ExpMon, ExpSock, ExpType, "client").
 2153: 
 2154: sm_await_socket_down(ExpMon, ExpSock, ExpType, Name) ->
 2155:     receive
 2156: 	{'DOWN', Mon, Type, Sock, Info} when (Type =:= ExpType) andalso 
 2157: 					     (Mon  =:= ExpMon)  andalso 
 2158: 					     (Sock =:= ExpSock) ->
 2159: 	    ?P("[~s] received expected (socket) down message: "
 2160: 	       "~n   Mon:  ~p"
 2161: 	       "~n   Type: ~p"
 2162: 	       "~n   Sock: ~p"
 2163: 	       "~n   Info: ~p", [Name, Mon, Type, Sock, Info]),
 2164: 	    exit(ok);
 2165: 
 2166: 	Any ->
 2167: 	    ?P("[~s] received unexpected message: "
 2168: 	       "~n   ~p", [Name, Any]),
 2169: 	    exit({unexpected_message, Any})
 2170:     end.
 2171: 
 2172: sm_await_client_ready(Pid) ->
 2173:     sm_await_client_ready(Pid, "client").
 2174: 
 2175: sm_await_client_ready(Pid, Name) ->
 2176:     receive
 2177: 	{Pid, ready} ->
 2178: 	    ?P("received ~s ready", [Name])
 2179:     end.
 2180: 
 2181: sm_await_down(Pid, Mon, ExpRes) ->
 2182:     receive
 2183: 	{'DOWN', Mon, process, Pid, ExpRes} ->
 2184: 	    ?P("received expected process down message from ~p", [Pid]),
 2185: 	    ok;
 2186: 	{'DOWN', Mon, process, Pid, UnexpRes} ->
 2187: 	    ?P("received unexpected process down message from ~p: "
 2188: 	       "~n   ~p", [Pid, UnexpRes]),
 2189: 	    ct:fail({unexpected_down, UnexpRes})
 2190:     end.
 2191: 
 2192: 
 2193: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 2194: 
 2195: %% This is the most basic of tests.
 2196: %% We create "many" socket(s), then spawn processes that create
 2197: %% monitors to them...
 2198: socket_monitor1_manys(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2199:     ct:timetrap(?MINS(1)),
 2200:     ?TC_TRY(socket_monitor1_manys,
 2201:             fun() -> do_socket_monitor1_manys(Config) end).
 2202: 
 2203: do_socket_monitor1_manys(Config) ->
 2204:     ?P("begin"),
 2205:     Self         = self(),
 2206:     Type         = ?SOCKET_TYPE(Config),
 2207:     ?P("[client] create socket(s)"),
 2208:     {ok, Sock1} = ?OPEN(Config),
 2209:     {ok, Sock2} = ?OPEN(Config),
 2210:     {ok, Sock3} = ?OPEN(Config),
 2211:     {ok, Sock4} = ?OPEN(Config),
 2212:     {ok, Sock5} = ?OPEN(Config),
 2213:     F  = fun(S, Fun) -> spawn_monitor(fun() -> Fun(S, Self) end) end,
 2214:     F1 = fun(Sockets, Parent) when is_list(Sockets) andalso is_pid(Parent) ->
 2215: 		 ?P("[client] create monitor(s)"),
 2216: 		 Monitors = [{inet:monitor(Socket), Socket} ||
 2217: 				Socket <- Sockets],
 2218: 		 Parent ! {self(), ready},
 2219: 		 sm_await_socket_down2(Monitors, Type)
 2220: 	 end,
 2221:     ?P("spawn client"),
 2222:     {Pid1, Mon1} = F([Sock1, Sock2, Sock3, Sock4, Sock5], F1),
 2223:     ?P("await client ready"),
 2224:     sm_await_client_ready(Pid1),
 2225:     ?P("close socket(s)"),
 2226:     gen_udp:close(Sock1),
 2227:     gen_udp:close(Sock2),
 2228:     gen_udp:close(Sock3),
 2229:     gen_udp:close(Sock4),
 2230:     gen_udp:close(Sock5),
 2231:     ?P("await client termination"),
 2232:     sm_await_down(Pid1, Mon1, ok),
 2233:     ?P("done"),
 2234:     ok.
 2235: 
 2236: 
 2237: sm_await_socket_down2(Monitors, ExpType) ->
 2238:     sm_await_socket_down2(Monitors, ExpType, "client").
 2239: 
 2240: sm_await_socket_down2([], _ExpType, Name) ->
 2241:     ?P("[~s] all sockets down", [Name]),
 2242:     exit(ok);
 2243: sm_await_socket_down2(Mons, ExpType, Name) when is_list(Mons) ->
 2244:     ?P("[~s] await socket down", [Name]),
 2245:     receive
 2246: 	{'DOWN', Mon, Type, Sock, Info} when (Type =:= ExpType) ->
 2247: 	    ?P("[~s] received expected (socket) down message: "
 2248: 	       "~n   Mon:  ~p"
 2249: 	       "~n   Type: ~p"
 2250: 	       "~n   Sock: ~p"
 2251: 	       "~n   Info: ~p", [Name, Mon, Type, Sock, Info]),
 2252: 	    case lists:keysearch(Mon, 1, Mons) of
 2253: 		{value, {Mon, Sock}} ->
 2254: 		    Mons2 = lists:keydelete(Mon, 1, Mons),
 2255: 		    sm_await_socket_down2(Mons2, ExpType, Name);
 2256: 		{value, Value} ->
 2257: 		    ?P("[~s] Unexpected socket down: "
 2258: 		       "~n   Value: ~p", [Name, Value]),
 2259: 		    ct:fail({unexpected_monitor, Mon, Value});
 2260: 		false ->
 2261: 		    ct:fail({unknown_monitor, Mon})
 2262: 	    end
 2263:     end.
 2264: 
 2265: 
 2266: 
 2267: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 2268: 
 2269: %% This is the most basic of tests.
 2270: %% We create a socket, then spawn client process(es) that create
 2271: %% monitors to it...
 2272: socket_monitor1_manyc(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2273:     ct:timetrap(?MINS(1)),
 2274:     ?TC_TRY(socket_monitor1_manyc,
 2275:             fun() -> do_socket_monitor1_manyc(Config) end).
 2276: 
 2277: do_socket_monitor1_manyc(Config) ->
 2278:     ?P("begin"),
 2279:     Self         = self(),
 2280:     Type         = ?SOCKET_TYPE(Config),
 2281:     {ok, Sock1}  = ?OPEN(Config),
 2282:     F  = fun(S, Fun, Name) ->
 2283: 		 spawn_monitor(fun() -> Fun(S, Name, Self) end)
 2284: 	 end,
 2285:     F1 = fun(Socket, Name, Parent) when is_list(Name) andalso is_pid(Parent) ->
 2286: 		 ?P("[~s] monitor socket", [Name]),
 2287: 		 MRef = inet:monitor(Socket),
 2288: 		 Parent ! {self(), ready},
 2289: 		 sm_await_socket_down(MRef, Socket, Type)
 2290: 	 end,
 2291:     ?P("spawn client(s)"),
 2292:     {Pid1, Mon1} = F(Sock1, F1, "client1"),
 2293:     {Pid2, Mon2} = F(Sock1, F1, "client2"),
 2294:     {Pid3, Mon3} = F(Sock1, F1, "client3"),
 2295:     {Pid4, Mon4} = F(Sock1, F1, "client4"),
 2296:     {Pid5, Mon5} = F(Sock1, F1, "client5"),
 2297:     ?P("await client(s) ready"),
 2298:     sm_await_client_ready(Pid1, "client1"),
 2299:     sm_await_client_ready(Pid2, "client2"),
 2300:     sm_await_client_ready(Pid3, "client3"),
 2301:     sm_await_client_ready(Pid4, "client4"),
 2302:     sm_await_client_ready(Pid5, "client5"),
 2303:     ?P("close socket"),
 2304:     gen_udp:close(Sock1),
 2305:     ?P("await client(s) termination"),
 2306:     sm_await_down(Pid1, Mon1, ok),
 2307:     sm_await_down(Pid2, Mon2, ok),
 2308:     sm_await_down(Pid3, Mon3, ok),
 2309:     sm_await_down(Pid4, Mon4, ok),
 2310:     sm_await_down(Pid5, Mon5, ok),
 2311:     ?P("done"),
 2312:     ok.
 2313: 
 2314: 
 2315: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 2316: 
 2317: %% This is the most basic of tests.
 2318: %% We create a socket, then spawns processes that create
 2319: %% monitors to it...
 2320: socket_monitor1_demon_after(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2321:     ct:timetrap(?MINS(1)),
 2322:     ?TC_TRY(socket_monitor1_demon_after,
 2323:             fun() -> do_socket_monitor1_demon_after(Config) end).
 2324: 
 2325: do_socket_monitor1_demon_after(Config) ->
 2326:     ?P("begin"),
 2327:     Self         = self(),
 2328:     Type         = ?SOCKET_TYPE(Config),
 2329:     {ok, Sock1}  = ?OPEN(Config),
 2330:     F  = fun(S, Fun) -> spawn_monitor(fun() -> Fun(S, Self) end) end,
 2331:     F1 = fun(Socket, Parent) when is_pid(Parent) ->
 2332: 		 ?P("[client] create monitor"),
 2333: 		 MRef = inet:monitor(Socket),
 2334: 		 ?P("[client] sleep some"),
 2335: 		 ?SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
 2336: 		 ?P("[client] cancel (socket) monitor"),
 2337: 		 inet:cancel_monitor(MRef),
 2338: 		 ?P("[client] announce ready"),
 2339: 		 Parent ! {self(), ready},
 2340: 		 sm_await_no_socket_down(MRef, Socket, Type)
 2341: 	 end,
 2342:     ?P("spawn client"),
 2343:     {Pid1, Mon1} = F(Sock1, F1),
 2344:     ?P("await client ready"),
 2345:     sm_await_client_ready(Pid1),
 2346:     ?P("close socket"),
 2347:     gen_udp:close(Sock1),
 2348:     ?P("await client termination"),
 2349:     sm_await_down(Pid1, Mon1, ok),
 2350:     ?P("done"),
 2351:     ok.
 2352: 
 2353: 
 2354: sm_await_no_socket_down(ExpMon, ExpSock, ExpType) ->
 2355:     sm_await_no_socket_down(ExpMon, ExpSock, ExpType, "client").
 2356: 
 2357: sm_await_no_socket_down(ExpMon, ExpSock, ExpType, Name) ->
 2358:     receive
 2359: 	{'DOWN', Mon, Type, Sock, Info} when (Type =:= ExpType) andalso 
 2360: 					     (Mon  =:= ExpMon)  andalso 
 2361: 					     (Sock =:= ExpSock) ->
 2362: 	    ?P("[~s] received unexpected (socket) down message: "
 2363: 	       "~n   Mon:  ~p"
 2364: 	       "~n   Type: ~p"
 2365: 	       "~n   Sock: ~p"
 2366: 	       "~n   Info: ~p", [Name, Mon, Type, Sock, Info]),
 2367: 	    exit({unexpected_down, Mon, Type, Sock, Info});
 2368: 
 2369: 	Any ->
 2370: 	    ?P("[~s] received unexpected message: "
 2371: 	       "~n   ~p", [Name, Any]),
 2372: 	    exit({unexpected_message, Any})
 2373: 
 2374:     after 1000 ->
 2375: 	    ?P("[~s] expected message timeout", [Name]),
 2376: 	    exit(ok)
 2377:     end.
 2378: 
 2379: 
 2380: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 2381: 
 2382: %% This is the most basic of tests.
 2383: %% Spawn a process that creates a socket, then spawns processes
 2384: %% that create monitors to it...
 2385: socket_monitor2(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2386:     ct:timetrap(?MINS(1)),
 2387:     ?TC_TRY(socket_monitor2,
 2388:             fun() -> do_socket_monitor2(Config) end).
 2389: 
 2390: do_socket_monitor2(Config) ->
 2391:     ?P("begin"),
 2392:     Type         = ?SOCKET_TYPE(Config),
 2393:     Self         = self(),
 2394:     {OwnerPid, OwnerMon} =
 2395: 	spawn_monitor(fun() ->
 2396: 			      ?P("[owner] create (listen) socket"),
 2397: 			      {ok, S} = ?OPEN(Config),
 2398: 			      ?P("[owner] send socket to ctrl"),
 2399: 			      Self ! {socket, S},
 2400: 			      ?P("[owner] ready"),
 2401: 			      receive
 2402: 				  {Self, die} ->
 2403: 				      exit(normal)
 2404: 			      end
 2405: 		      end),
 2406:     Sock1 = receive
 2407:                 {socket, S} ->
 2408:                     ?P("received socket from owner"),
 2409:                     S;
 2410:                 {'DOWN', OwnerMon, process, OwnerPid, OwnerReason} ->
 2411:                     ?P("received unexpected owner termination: "
 2412:                        "~n   ~p", [OwnerReason]),
 2413:                     ct:fail({unexpected_owner_termination, OwnerReason})
 2414: 	     end,
 2415:     F  = fun(S, Fun) -> spawn_monitor(fun() -> Fun(S, Self) end) end,
 2416:     F1 = fun(Socket, Parent) when is_pid(Parent) ->
 2417: 		 ?P("[client] create monitor"),
 2418: 		 MRef = inet:monitor(Socket),
 2419: 		 Parent ! {self(), ready},
 2420: 		 sm_await_socket_down(MRef, Socket, Type)
 2421: 	 end,
 2422:     ?P("spawn client"),
 2423:     {Pid1, Mon1} = F(Sock1, F1),
 2424:     ?P("spawn client"),
 2425:     sm_await_client_ready(Pid1),
 2426:     ?P("kill owner"),
 2427:     exit(OwnerPid, kill),
 2428:     ?P("await owner termination"),
 2429:     sm_await_down(OwnerPid, OwnerMon, killed),
 2430:     ?P("await client termination"),
 2431:     sm_await_down(Pid1, Mon1, ok),
 2432:     ?P("done"),
 2433:     ok.
 2434: 
 2435: 
 2436: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 2437: 
 2438: %% This is the most basic of tests.
 2439: %% Spawn a process that creates "many" socket(s), then spawns
 2440: %% a process that create monitors to them...
 2441: 
 2442: socket_monitor2_manys(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2443:     ct:timetrap(?MINS(1)),
 2444:     ?TC_TRY(socket_monitor2_manys,
 2445:             fun() -> do_socket_monitor2_manys(Config) end).
 2446: 
 2447: do_socket_monitor2_manys(Config) ->
 2448:     ?P("begin"),
 2449:     Type         = ?SOCKET_TYPE(Config),
 2450:     Self         = self(),
 2451:     ?P("spawn owner"),
 2452:     {OwnerPid, OwnerMon} =
 2453: 	spawn_monitor(fun() ->
 2454: 			      ?P("[owner] create (listen) socket(s)"),
 2455: 			      {ok, S1} = ?OPEN(Config),
 2456: 			      {ok, S2} = ?OPEN(Config),
 2457: 			      {ok, S3} = ?OPEN(Config),
 2458: 			      {ok, S4} = ?OPEN(Config),
 2459: 			      {ok, S5} = ?OPEN(Config),
 2460: 			      ?P("[owner] send (listen) socket(s) to ctrl"),
 2461: 			      Self ! {socket, [S1, S2, S3, S4, S5]},
 2462: 			      ?P("[owner] ready"),
 2463: 			      receive
 2464: 				  {Self, die} ->
 2465: 				      exit(normal)
 2466: 			      end
 2467: 		      end),
 2468:     ?P("await sockets (from owner)"),
 2469:     Socks = receive
 2470:                 {socket, Ss} ->
 2471:                     ?P("received socket(s) from owner"),
 2472:                     Ss;
 2473:                 {'DOWN', OwnerMon, process, OwnerPid, OwnerReason} ->
 2474:                     ?P("received unexpected owner termination: "
 2475:                        "~n   ~p", [OwnerReason]),
 2476:                     ct:fail({unexpected_owner_termination, OwnerReason})
 2477:             end,
 2478:     F  = fun(S, Fun) -> spawn_monitor(fun() -> Fun(S, Self) end) end,
 2479:     F1 = fun(Sockets, Parent) when is_list(Sockets) andalso is_pid(Parent) ->
 2480: 		 ?P("[client] create monitor(s)"),
 2481: 		 Monitors = [{inet:monitor(Socket), Socket} ||
 2482: 				Socket <- Sockets],
 2483: 		 ?P("[client] announce ready"),
 2484: 		 Parent ! {self(), ready},
 2485: 		 sm_await_socket_down2(Monitors, Type)
 2486: 	 end,
 2487:     ?P("spawn client"),
 2488:     {Pid1, Mon1} = F(Socks, F1),
 2489:     ?P("await client ready"),
 2490:     sm_await_client_ready(Pid1),
 2491:     ?P("kill owner"),
 2492:     exit(OwnerPid, kill),
 2493:     ?P("await owner (~p) termination", [OwnerPid]),
 2494:     sm_await_down(OwnerPid, OwnerMon, killed),
 2495:     ?P("await client termination"),
 2496:     sm_await_down(Pid1, Mon1, ok),
 2497:     ?P("done"),
 2498:     ok.
 2499: 
 2500: 
 2501: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 2502: 
 2503: %% This is the most basic of tests.
 2504: %% Spawn a process that creates a socket, then spawns (client)
 2505: %% processes that create monitors to it...
 2506: socket_monitor2_manyc(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2507:     ct:timetrap(?MINS(1)),
 2508:     ?TC_TRY(socket_monitor2_manyc,
 2509:             fun() -> do_socket_monitor2_manyc(Config) end).
 2510: 
 2511: do_socket_monitor2_manyc(Config) ->
 2512:     ?P("begin"),
 2513:     Type         = ?SOCKET_TYPE(Config),
 2514:     Self         = self(),
 2515:     {OwnerPid, OwnerMon} =
 2516: 	spawn_monitor(fun() ->
 2517: 			      {ok, S} = ?OPEN(Config),
 2518: 			      Self ! {socket, S},
 2519: 			      receive
 2520: 				  {Self, die} ->
 2521: 				      exit(normal)
 2522: 			      end
 2523: 		      end),
 2524:     Sock1 = receive
 2525: 		 {socket, S} ->
 2526: 		     ?P("received socket from owner"),
 2527: 		     S;
 2528: 		 {'DOWN', OwnerMon, process, OwnerPid, OwnerReason} ->
 2529: 		     ?P("received unexpected owner termination: "
 2530: 			"~n   ~p", [OwnerReason]),
 2531: 		     ct:fail({unexpected_owner_termination, OwnerReason})
 2532: 	     end,
 2533:     F  = fun(S, Fun, Name) ->
 2534: 		 spawn_monitor(fun() -> Fun(S, Name, Self) end)
 2535: 	 end,
 2536:     F1 = fun(Socket, Name, Parent) when is_list(Name) andalso is_pid(Parent) ->
 2537: 		 ?P("[~s] create monitor", [Name]),
 2538: 		 MRef = inet:monitor(Socket),
 2539: 		 Parent ! {self(), ready},
 2540: 		 sm_await_socket_down(MRef, Socket, Type, Name)
 2541: 	 end,
 2542:     ?P("spawn client(s)"),
 2543:     {Pid1, Mon1} = F(Sock1, F1, "client1"),
 2544:     {Pid2, Mon2} = F(Sock1, F1, "client2"),
 2545:     {Pid3, Mon3} = F(Sock1, F1, "client3"),
 2546:     {Pid4, Mon4} = F(Sock1, F1, "client4"),
 2547:     {Pid5, Mon5} = F(Sock1, F1, "client5"),
 2548:     ?P("await client(s) ready"),
 2549:     sm_await_client_ready(Pid1, "client1"),
 2550:     sm_await_client_ready(Pid2, "client2"),
 2551:     sm_await_client_ready(Pid3, "client3"),
 2552:     sm_await_client_ready(Pid4, "client4"),
 2553:     sm_await_client_ready(Pid5, "client5"),
 2554:     ?P("kill owner"),
 2555:     exit(OwnerPid, kill),
 2556:     ?P("await owner termination"),
 2557:     sm_await_down(OwnerPid, OwnerMon, killed),
 2558:     ?P("await client(s) termination"),
 2559:     sm_await_down(Pid1, Mon1, ok),
 2560:     sm_await_down(Pid2, Mon2, ok),
 2561:     sm_await_down(Pid3, Mon3, ok),
 2562:     sm_await_down(Pid4, Mon4, ok),
 2563:     sm_await_down(Pid5, Mon5, ok),
 2564:     ?P("done"),
 2565:     ok.
 2566: 
 2567: 
 2568: 
 2569: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 2570: 
 2571: %% This is the most basic of tests.
 2572: %% Spawn a process that creates a socket, then spawns (client)
 2573: %% processes that create monitors to it...
 2574: otp_17492(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2575:     ct:timetrap(?MINS(1)),
 2576:     ?TC_TRY(otp_17492, fun() -> do_otp_17492(Config) end).
 2577: 
 2578: do_otp_17492(Config) ->
 2579:     ?P("begin"),
 2580: 
 2581:     Self = self(),
 2582: 
 2583:     ?P("try create socket"),
 2584:     {ok, L} = ?OPEN(Config, 0, []),
 2585: 
 2586:     ?P("try get (created) socket info"),
 2587:     try inet:info(L) of
 2588: 	#{owner := Owner} = Info when is_pid(Owner) andalso (Owner =:= Self) ->
 2589: 	    ?P("(created) socket info: ~p", [Info]);
 2590: 	OBadInfo ->
 2591: 	    ?P("(created) socket info: ~p", [OBadInfo]),
 2592: 	    (catch gen_udp:close(L)),
 2593: 	    ct:fail({invalid_created_info, OBadInfo})
 2594:     catch
 2595: 	OC:OE:OS ->
 2596: 	    ?P("Failed get (created) Listen socket info: "
 2597: 	       "~n   Class: ~p"
 2598: 	       "~n   Error: ~p"
 2599: 	       "~n   Stack: ~p", [OC, OE, OS]),
 2600: 	    (catch gen_udp:close(L)),
 2601: 	    ct:fail({unexpected_created_info_result, {OC, OE, OS}})
 2602:     end,
 2603: 
 2604:     ?P("try close socket"),
 2605:     ok = gen_udp:close(L),
 2606: 
 2607:     ?P("try get (closed) socket info"),
 2608:     try inet:info(L) of
 2609: 	#{states := [closed]} = CInfo when is_port(L) ->
 2610: 	    ?P("(closed) socket info: "
 2611: 	       "~n   ~p", [CInfo]);
 2612: 	#{rstates := [closed], wstates := [closed]} = CInfo ->
 2613: 	    ?P("(closed) socket info: "
 2614: 	       "~n   ~p", [CInfo]);
 2615: 	CBadInfo ->
 2616: 	    ?P("(closed) socket info: ~p", [CBadInfo]),
 2617: 	    ct:fail({invalid_closed_info, CBadInfo})
 2618:     catch
 2619: 	CC:CE:CS ->
 2620: 	    ?P("Failed get (closed) socket info: "
 2621: 	       "~n   Class: ~p"
 2622: 	       "~n   Error: ~p"
 2623: 	       "~n   Stack: ~p", [CC, CE, CS]),
 2624: 	    (catch gen_udp:close(L)),
 2625: 	    ct:fail({unexpected_closed_info_result, {CC, CE, CS}})
 2626:     end,
 2627: 
 2628:     ?P("done"),
 2629:     ok.
 2630: 
 2631: 
 2632: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 2633: 
 2634: %% This is the most basic of tests.
 2635: 
 2636: %% Here we use socket:sockaddr_in6() when creating and using the
 2637: %% socket(s).
 2638: %%
 2639: t_simple_local_sockaddr_in6_send_recv(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2640:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME,
 2641:             fun() -> ?LIB:has_support_ipv6() end,
 2642:             fun() ->
 2643:                     Domain = inet6,
 2644:                     LocalAddr =
 2645:                         case ?LIB:which_local_addr(Domain) of
 2646:                             {ok, LA} ->
 2647:                                 LA;
 2648:                         {error, _} ->
 2649:                             skip("No local address")
 2650:                     end,
 2651:                     SockAddr = #{family   => Domain,
 2652:                                  addr     => LocalAddr,
 2653:                                  port     => 0},
 2654:                     do_simple_sockaddr_send_recv(SockAddr, Config)
 2655:             end).
 2656: 
 2657: 
 2658: t_simple_link_local_sockaddr_in6_send_recv(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2659:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME,
 2660:             fun() ->
 2661:                     ?LIB:has_support_ipv6(),
 2662:                     is_net_supported(),
 2663:                     is_not_darwin()
 2664:             end,
 2665:             fun() ->
 2666:                     Domain = inet6,
 2667:                     LinkLocalAddr =
 2668:                         case ?LIB:which_link_local_addr(Domain) of
 2669:                             {ok, LLA} ->
 2670:                                 LLA;
 2671:                             {error, _} ->
 2672:                                 skip("No link local address")
 2673:                         end,
 2674:                     Filter =
 2675:                         fun(#{addr := #{family := D,
 2676:                                         addr   := A}} = C) ->
 2677:                                 if 
 2678:                                     (D =:= Domain) andalso
 2679:                                     (A =:= LinkLocalAddr) ->
 2680:                                         ?P("found link-local candidate: "
 2681:                                            "~n   ~p", [C]),
 2682:                                         true;
 2683:                                     true ->
 2684:                                         false
 2685:                                 end;
 2686:                            (_) ->
 2687:                                 false
 2688:                         end,
 2689:                     case net:getifaddrs(Filter) of
 2690:                         {ok, [#{addr := #{scope_id := ScopeID}}=H|T]} ->
 2691:                             ?P("found link-local candidate(s): "
 2692:                                "~n   Candidate:       ~p"
 2693:                                "~n   Rest Candidate:  ~p", [H, T]),
 2694:                             SockAddr = #{family   => Domain,
 2695:                                          addr     => LinkLocalAddr,
 2696:                                          port     => 0,
 2697:                                          scope_id => ScopeID},
 2698:                             do_simple_sockaddr_send_recv(SockAddr, Config);
 2699:                         {ok, _} ->
 2700:                             skip("Scope ID not found");
 2701:                         {error, R} ->
 2702:                             skip({failed_getifaddrs, R})
 2703:                     end
 2704:             end).
 2705: 
 2706: t_simple_local_sockaddr_in_send_recv(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2707:     ct:timetrap(?MINS(1)),
 2708:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME,
 2709:             fun() -> ok end,
 2710:             fun() ->
 2711:                     Domain = inet,
 2712:                     LocalAddr =
 2713:                         case ?LIB:which_local_addr(Domain) of
 2714:                             {ok, LA} ->
 2715:                                 LA;
 2716:                         {error, _} ->
 2717:                             skip("No local address")
 2718:                     end,
 2719:                     SockAddr = #{family   => Domain,
 2720:                                  addr     => LocalAddr,
 2721:                                  port     => 0},
 2722:                     do_simple_sockaddr_send_recv(SockAddr, Config)
 2723:             end).
 2724: 
 2725: t_simple_link_local_sockaddr_in_send_recv(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2726:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME,
 2727:             fun() -> ok end,
 2728:             fun() ->
 2729:                     Domain = inet,
 2730:                     LinkLocalAddr =
 2731:                         case ?LIB:which_link_local_addr(Domain) of
 2732:                             {ok, LLA} ->
 2733:                                 LLA;
 2734:                             {error, _} ->
 2735:                                 skip("No link local address")
 2736:                         end,
 2737:                     SockAddr = #{family => Domain,
 2738:                                  addr   => LinkLocalAddr,
 2739:                                  port   => 0},
 2740:                     do_simple_sockaddr_send_recv(SockAddr, Config)
 2741:             end).
 2742: 
 2743: 
 2744: do_simple_sockaddr_send_recv(#{family := _Fam} = SockAddr, _) ->
 2745:     %% Create the server
 2746:     Self   = self(),
 2747:     ?P("~n      SockAddr: ~p", [SockAddr]),
 2748:     ServerF = fun() ->
 2749:                       ?P("[server] try create socket"),
 2750:                       Sock =
 2751:                           try gen_udp:open(0, [{ifaddr, SockAddr},
 2752:                                                {active, true},
 2753:                                                binary]) of
 2754:                               {ok, S} ->
 2755:                                   S;
 2756:                               {error, OReason} ->
 2757:                                   ?P("[server] open error: "
 2758:                                      "~n      Reason: ~p", [OReason]),
 2759:                                   exit({open_error, OReason})
 2760:                           catch
 2761:                               OC:OE:OS ->
 2762:                                   ?P("[server] open failure: "
 2763:                                      "~n      Error Class: ~p"
 2764:                                      "~n      Error:       ~p"
 2765:                                      "~n      Call Stack:  ~p", [OC, OE, OS]),
 2766:                                   exit({open_failure, {OC, OE, OS}})
 2767:                           end,
 2768:                       ?P("[server] try get port"),
 2769:                       {ok, Port}  = inet:port(Sock),
 2770:                       ?P("[server] port: ~w", [Port]),
 2771:                       Self ! {{port, Port}, self()},
 2772: 
 2773: 
 2774:                       %% --- message sequance 1 ---
 2775: 
 2776:                       ?P("[server] await message 1"),
 2777:                       {CIP, CPort} =
 2778:                           receive
 2779:                               {udp, Sock, CIP1, CPort1, <<"hej">>} ->
 2780:                                   ?P("[server] received expected message 1 - "
 2781:                                      "connect to *this* client"),
 2782:                                   ok = gen_udp:connect(Sock, CIP1, CPort1),
 2783:                                   ?P("[server] send reply"),
 2784:                                   case gen_udp:send(Sock, "hopp") of
 2785:                                       ok -> 
 2786:                                           {CIP1, CPort1};
 2787:                                       {error, ehostunreach = Reason1} ->
 2788:                                           ?P("[server] send failed: ~p",
 2789:                                              [Reason1]),
 2790:                                           exit({skip, Reason1});
 2791:                                       {error, enetunreach = Reason1} ->
 2792:                                           ?P("[server] send failed: ~p",
 2793:                                              [Reason1]),
 2794:                                           exit({skip, Reason1});
 2795:                                       {error, Reason1} ->
 2796:                                           exit({send_failed, Reason1})
 2797:                                   end
 2798:                           after 5000 ->
 2799:                                   ?P("[server] receive (1) timeout:"
 2800:                                      "~n      ~p", [mq()]),
 2801:                                   exit(receive_timeout)
 2802:                           end,
 2803: 
 2804: 
 2805:                       %% --- message sequance 2 ---
 2806: 
 2807:                       ?P("[server] await message 2"),
 2808:                       receive
 2809:                           {udp, Sock, CIP2, CPort2, <<"hej">>}
 2810:                             when (CIP2 =:= CIP) andalso (CPort2 =:= CPort) ->
 2811:                               ?P("[server] received expected message 2 - "
 2812:                                  "send reply"),
 2813:                               case gen_udp:send(Sock, "hopp") of
 2814:                                   ok -> 
 2815:                                       ok;
 2816:                                   {error, ehostunreach = Reason2} ->
 2817:                                       ?P("[server] send failed: ~p",
 2818:                                          [Reason2]),
 2819:                                       exit({skip, Reason2});
 2820:                                   {error, enetunreach = Reason2} ->
 2821:                                       ?P("[server] send failed: ~p",
 2822:                                          [Reason2]),
 2823:                                       exit({skip, Reason2});
 2824:                                   {error, Reason2} ->
 2825:                                       exit({send_failed, Reason2})
 2826:                               end
 2827:                       after 5000 ->
 2828:                               ?P("[server] receive (2) timeout:"
 2829:                                  "~n      ~p", [mq()]),
 2830:                               exit(receive_timeout)
 2831:                       end,
 2832: 
 2833: 
 2834:                       %% --- message sequance 3 ---
 2835: 
 2836:                       ?P("[server] await message 3"),
 2837:                       receive
 2838:                           {udp, Sock, CIP3, CPort3, <<"hej">>}
 2839:                             when (CIP3 =:= CIP) andalso (CPort3 =:= CPort) ->
 2840:                               ?P("[server] received expected message 3 - "
 2841:                                  "send reply"),
 2842:                               ok = gen_udp:send(Sock, "hopp")
 2843:                       after 5000 ->
 2844:                               ?P("[server] receive (3) timeout:"
 2845:                                  "~n      ~p", [mq()]),
 2846:                               exit(receive_timeout)
 2847:                       end,
 2848: 
 2849: 
 2850:                       %% --- message sequance 4 ---
 2851: 
 2852:                       ?P("[server] await message 4 - should be none!"),
 2853:                       receive
 2854:                           {udp, Sock, CIP4, CPort4, <<"hej">>} ->
 2855:                               ?P("[server] received unexpected message 4:"
 2856:                                  "~n      Address: ~p"
 2857:                                  "~n      Port:    ~p", [CIP4, CPort4]),
 2858:                               exit({unexpected_message, CIP4, CPort4})
 2859:                       after
 2860:                           1000 ->
 2861:                               ?P("Received nothing - expected"),
 2862:                               Self ! {nothing, self()}
 2863:                       end,
 2864: 
 2865:                       ?P("[server] await termination command"),
 2866:                       receive
 2867:                           {die, Self} ->
 2868:                               ?P("[server] terminating"),
 2869:                               (catch gen_udp:close(Sock)),
 2870:                               exit(normal)
 2871:                       end
 2872:               end,
 2873:     ?P("try start server"),
 2874:     Server = spawn_link(ServerF),
 2875:     ?P("server started - await port "),
 2876:     ServerPort = receive
 2877:                      {{port, Port}, Server} ->
 2878:                          Port;
 2879:                      {'EXIT', Server, Reason} ->
 2880:                          ?P("server died unexpectedly: "
 2881:                             "~n      ~p", [Reason]),
 2882:                          exit({unexpected_server_failure, Reason})
 2883:                  end,
 2884:     ?P("server port received: ~p", [ServerPort]),
 2885:     
 2886:     ?P("try connect to server"),
 2887:     ServerSockAddr = SockAddr#{port => ServerPort},
 2888:     {ok, CSock1} = gen_udp:open(0,
 2889:                                 [{ifaddr, SockAddr},
 2890:                                  {active, true},
 2891:                                  binary]),
 2892:     {ok, CSock2} = gen_udp:open(0,
 2893:                                 [{ifaddr, SockAddr},
 2894:                                  {active, true},
 2895:                                  binary]),
 2896:     ?P("client socket: "
 2897:        "~n      CSock 1: ~p"
 2898:        "~n      CPort 1: ~p"
 2899:        "~n      CSock 2: ~p"
 2900:        "~n      CPort 2: ~p",
 2901:        [CSock1, inet:port(CSock1), CSock2, inet:port(CSock2)]),
 2902: 
 2903: 
 2904:     %% --- message sequance 1 ---
 2905: 
 2906:     ?P("[csock 1] try (trad = address and port) send message 1"),
 2907:     case gen_udp:send(CSock1, maps:get(addr, SockAddr), ServerPort, "hej") of
 2908:         ok ->
 2909:             ok;
 2910:         {error, ehostunreach = Reason1} ->
 2911:             ?SKIPT(?F("send (1,1) failed: ~p", [Reason1]));
 2912:         {error, Reason1} ->
 2913:             ct:fail({send_failed, Reason1})
 2914:     end,
 2915:                  
 2916: 
 2917:     ?P("[csock 1] await reply message 1"),
 2918:     receive
 2919:         {udp, CSock1, _, _, <<"hopp">>} ->
 2920:             ?P("[csock 1] received expected reply message 1"),
 2921:             ok;
 2922: 
 2923:         {'EXIT', Server, {skip, SReason1}} ->
 2924:             ?P("received unexpected server skip exit (1):"
 2925:                "~n      ~p", [SReason1]),
 2926:             ?SKIPT(?F("server send (1,1) failed: ~p", [SReason1]));
 2927: 
 2928:         {'EXIT', Server, SReason1} ->
 2929:             ?P("received unexpected server exit (1):"
 2930:                "~n      ~p", [SReason1]),
 2931:             ct:fail({unexpected_server_exit, 1, SReason1})
 2932: 
 2933:     after 5000 ->
 2934:             ?P("receive (1) timeout:"
 2935:                "~n      ~p", [mq()]),
 2936:             ct:fail(receive_timeout)
 2937:     end,
 2938: 
 2939: 
 2940:     %% --- message sequance 2 ---
 2941: 
 2942:     ?P("[csock 1] try (sockaddr) send message 2"),
 2943:     %% DstSockAddr = #{family => maps:get(family, SockAddr),
 2944:     %%                 addr   => maps:get(addr, SockAddr),
 2945:     %%                 port   => ServerPort},
 2946:     DstSockAddr = ServerSockAddr,
 2947:     case gen_udp:send(CSock1, DstSockAddr, "hej") of
 2948:         ok ->
 2949:             ok;
 2950:         {error, ehostunreach = Reason2} ->
 2951:             ?SKIPT(?F("send (1,2) failed: ~p", [Reason2]));
 2952:         {error, Reason2} ->
 2953:             ct:fail({send_failed, Reason2})
 2954:     end,
 2955:         
 2956: 
 2957:     ?P("[csock 1] await reply message 2"),
 2958:     receive
 2959:         {udp, CSock1, _, _, <<"hopp">>} ->
 2960:             ?P("[csock 1] received expected reply message 2"),
 2961:             ok;
 2962: 
 2963:         {'EXIT', Server, {skip, SReason2}} ->
 2964:             ?P("received unexpected server skip exit (2):"
 2965:                "~n      ~p", [SReason2]),
 2966:             ?SKIPT(?F("server send (1,2) failed: ~p", [SReason2]));
 2967: 
 2968:         {'EXIT', Server, SReason2} ->
 2969:             ?P("received unexpected server exit (2):"
 2970:                "~n.     ~p", [SReason2]),
 2971:             ct:fail({unexpected_server_exit, 2, SReason2})
 2972: 
 2973:     after 5000 ->
 2974:             ?P("[csock 1] receive (2) timeout:"
 2975:                "~n      ~p", [mq()]),
 2976:             ct:fail(receive_timeout)
 2977:     end,
 2978: 
 2979: 
 2980:     %% --- message sequance 3 ---
 2981: 
 2982:     ?P("[csock 1] try connect to: "
 2983:        "~n      ~p", [ServerSockAddr]),
 2984:     ok = gen_udp:connect(CSock1, DstSockAddr),
 2985: 
 2986:     ?P("[csock 1] try send message 3"),
 2987:     ok = gen_udp:send(CSock1, "hej"),
 2988: 
 2989:     ?P("[csock 1] await reply message 3"),
 2990:     receive
 2991:         {udp, CSock1, _, _, <<"hopp">>} ->
 2992:             ?P("received expected reply message 3"),
 2993:             ok;
 2994: 
 2995:         {'EXIT', Server, SReason3} ->
 2996:             ?P("received unexpected server exit (3):"
 2997:                "~n.     ~p", [SReason3]),
 2998:             ct:fail({unexpected_server_exit, 3, SReason3})
 2999: 
 3000:     after 5000 ->
 3001:             ?P("[csock 1] receive (2) timeout:"
 3002:                "~n      ~p", [mq()]),
 3003:             ct:fail(receive_timeout)
 3004: 
 3005:     end,
 3006: 
 3007: 
 3008:     %% --- message sequance 4 ---
 3009: 
 3010:     ?P("[csock 2] try (sockaddr) send message 4"),
 3011:     ok = gen_udp:send(CSock2, DstSockAddr, "hej"),
 3012: 
 3013:     ?P("[csock 2] await reply message 4 - expect failure"),
 3014:     receive
 3015:         {udp, CSock2, _, _, <<"hopp">>} ->
 3016:             ?P("[csock 2] received unexpected reply message 4"),
 3017:             exit(received_unexpected_message);
 3018:         {nothing, Server} ->
 3019:             ?P("[csock 2] server received nothing - expected"),
 3020:             ok
 3021:     end,
 3022: 
 3023: 
 3024:     ?P("terminate server"),
 3025:     Server ! {die, self()},
 3026: 
 3027:     ?P("await server termination"),
 3028:     receive
 3029:         {'EXIT', Server, normal} ->
 3030:             ok
 3031:     end,
 3032:     
 3033:     ?P("cleanup"),
 3034:     (catch gen_udp:close(CSock1)),
 3035:     (catch gen_udp:close(CSock2)),
 3036: 
 3037:     ?P("done"),
 3038:     ok.
 3039: 
 3040:     
 3041: 
 3042: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 3043: 
 3044: %% Verify that the options [add|drop]_membership do not mess up
 3045: %% the options (including 'ip' which could not be added *after*).
 3046: %% This just attempts to very that the option processing is ok.
 3047: otp_18323_opts_processing(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3048:     ct:timetrap(?MINS(1)),
 3049:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, fun() -> do_otp_18323_opts_processing(Config) end).
 3050: 
 3051: do_otp_18323_opts_processing(_Config) ->
 3052:     ?P("begin"),
 3053: 
 3054:     do_otp_18323_opts_processing_verify(
 3055:       {add_membership,  {{239,1,2,3},{0,0,0,0}}}),
 3056: 
 3057:     do_otp_18323_opts_processing_verify(
 3058:       {drop_membership, {{239,1,2,3},{0,0,0,0}}}),
 3059: 
 3060:     ?P("done"),
 3061:     ok.
 3062: 
 3063: do_otp_18323_opts_processing_verify(MembershipOpt) ->
 3064:     Port   = 4321,
 3065:     RecBuf = 123456,
 3066:     Active = 10,
 3067:     IP     = {1,2,3,4},
 3068:     Opts   = [binary, MembershipOpt, {ip, IP}, {active, Active}],
 3069: 
 3070:     case inet:udp_options([{port, Port}, {recbuf, RecBuf} | Opts], inet_udp) of
 3071:         {ok, #udp_opts{ifaddr = IP,
 3072:                        port   = Port,
 3073:                        opts   = SockOpts}} ->
 3074:             ?P("Processed Socket Options: "
 3075:                "~n   IfAddr:    ~p"
 3076:                "~n   Port:      ~p"
 3077:                "~n   Sock Opts: ~p", [IP, Port, SockOpts]),
 3078:             %% Check that the recbuf and mode options are as expected
 3079:             %% The option 'binary' is shorthand for {mode, binary}
 3080:             {value, {recbuf, RecBuf}} = lists:keysearch(recbuf, 1, SockOpts),
 3081:             {value, {mode,   binary}} = lists:keysearch(mode,   1, SockOpts),
 3082:             {value, {active, Active}} = lists:keysearch(active, 1, SockOpts),
 3083:             ok;
 3084:         {error, Reason} ->
 3085:             exit(?F("Failed processing options: ~p", [Reason]))
 3086:     end.
 3087: 
 3088: 
 3089: 
 3090: 
 3091: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 3092: 
 3093: %% Verify that the options [add|drop]_membership do not mess up
 3094: %% the options (including 'ip' which could not be added *after*).
 3095: otp_18323_open(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3096:     ct:timetrap(?MINS(1)),
 3097:     Pre  = fun() ->
 3098:                    {ok, Addr} = ?LIB:which_local_addr(inet),
 3099:                    #{local_addr => Addr}
 3100:            end,
 3101:     Case = fun(State) -> do_otp_18323_open(State) end,
 3102:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 3103:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Pre, Case, Post).
 3104: 
 3105: do_otp_18323_open(#{local_addr := Addr}) ->
 3106:     ?P("begin"),
 3107: 
 3108:     ROpts = [binary,
 3109:              {add_membership, {Addr,{0,0,0,0}}},
 3110:              {ip, Addr},
 3111:              {active,false},
 3112:              {debug, true}],
 3113:     SOpts = [{reuseaddr, true}, binary],
 3114: 
 3115:     ?P("create received socket"),
 3116:     {ok, R}     = gen_udp:open(0, ROpts),
 3117:     ?P("extract received socket port"),
 3118:     {ok, RPort} = inet:port(R),
 3119: 
 3120:     ?P("create sender socket"),
 3121:     {ok, S} = gen_udp:open(0, SOpts),
 3122: 
 3123:     ?P("send to receiver (at port ~w)", [RPort]),
 3124:     ok = gen_udp:send(S, Addr, RPort, <<"aaaaa">>),
 3125: 
 3126:     ?P("attempt to receive data on specified format binary)"),
 3127:     {ok, {_,_,<<"aaaaa">>}} = gen_udp:recv(R, 0, 200),
 3128: 
 3129:     ?P("done"),
 3130:     ok.
 3131: 
 3132: 
 3133: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 3134: 
 3135: ok({ok,V}) -> V;
 3136: ok(NotOk) ->
 3137:     try throw(not_ok)
 3138:     catch
 3139: 	throw:not_ok:Stacktrace ->
 3140: 	    raise_error({not_ok, NotOk}, tl(Stacktrace))
 3141:     end.
 3142: 
 3143: raise_error(Reason, Stacktrace) ->
 3144:     erlang:raise(error, Reason, Stacktrace).
 3145: 
 3146: local_filename(Tag) ->
 3147:     "/tmp/" ?MODULE_STRING "_" ++ os:getpid() ++ "_" ++ atom_to_list(Tag).
 3148: 
 3149: bin_filename(String) ->
 3150:     unicode:characters_to_binary(String, file:native_name_encoding()).
 3151: 
 3152: delete_local_filenames() ->
 3153:     _ =
 3154: 	[file:delete(F) ||
 3155: 	    F <-
 3156: 		filelib:wildcard(
 3157: 		  "/tmp/" ?MODULE_STRING "_" ++ os:getpid() ++ "_*")],
 3158:     ok.
 3159: 
 3160: get_localaddr() ->
 3161:     get_localaddr(["localhost", "localhost6", "ip6-localhost"]).
 3162: 
 3163: get_localaddr([]) ->
 3164:     {error, localaddr_not_found};
 3165: get_localaddr([Localhost|Ls]) ->
 3166:     case inet:getaddr(Localhost, inet6) of
 3167:        {ok, LocalAddr} ->
 3168:            ?P("found local address: ~s ~p", [Localhost, LocalAddr]),
 3169:            {ok, LocalAddr};
 3170:        _ ->
 3171:            get_localaddr(Ls)
 3172:     end.
 3173: 
 3174: 
 3175: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 3176: 
 3177: is_net_supported() ->
 3178:     try net:info() of
 3179:         #{} ->
 3180:             ok
 3181:     catch
 3182:         error : notsup ->
 3183:             not_supported(net)
 3184:     end.
 3185: 
 3186: 
 3187: is_not_darwin() ->
 3188:     is_not_platform(darwin, "Darwin").
 3189: 
 3190: is_not_windows() ->
 3191:     is_not_platform(win32, "Windows").
 3192: 
 3193: is_not_platform(Platform, PlatformStr)
 3194:   when is_atom(Platform) andalso is_list(PlatformStr) ->
 3195:       case os:type() of
 3196:         {unix, Platform} ->
 3197:             skip("This does not work on " ++ PlatformStr);
 3198:         {win32, nt} when (Platform =:= win32) ->
 3199:             skip("This does not work on " ++ PlatformStr);
 3200:         _ ->
 3201:             ok
 3202:     end.
 3203: 
 3204: 
 3205: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 3206: 
 3207: not_supported(What) ->
 3208:     skip({not_supported, What}).
 3209: 
 3210: skip(Reason) ->
 3211:     throw({skip, Reason}).
 3212: 
 3213: 
 3214: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 3215: 
 3216: which_info(Sock) ->
 3217:     which_info([istate, active], inet:info(Sock), #{}).
 3218: 
 3219: which_info([], _Info, Acc) ->
 3220:     Acc;
 3221: which_info([Key|Keys], Info, Acc) ->
 3222:     case maps:find(Key, Info) of
 3223:         {ok, Value} ->
 3224:             which_info(Keys, Info, Acc#{Key => Value});
 3225:         error ->
 3226:             which_info(Keys, Info, Acc)
 3227:     end.
 3228: 
 3229: 
 3230: mq() ->
 3231:     pi(messages).
 3232: 
 3233: pi(Item) ->
 3234:     {Item, Val} = process_info(self(), Item),
 3235:     Val.
 3236:     
 3237:

 3239:

 3241: %% Utils
 3242: %%
 3243: 
 3244: open_failed_str(Reason) ->
 3245:     ?F("Open failed: ~w", [Reason]).
